snippet: BINDER--Frederick M.,84 on January 16, 2016. Beloved husband of Teris, loving father of Abby and grandfather of Jaydon and Nathaniel. Professor emeritus at City University, College of Staten Island. Devoted and talented educator for 43 years. Services 10:30am Tuesday, January 19 at Temple Emeth, 1666 Windsor Rd., Teaneck, NJ. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BINDER--Frederick M.,84 on January 16, 2016. Beloved husband of Teris, loving father of Abby and grandfather of Jaydon and Nathaniel. headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BINDER, FREDERICK M.
